sections.summary: dedicated and focused office manager who excels at prioritizing, completing multiple tasks simultaneously, and following through to achieve project goals. seeking a role of increased responsibility and authority. resourceful and accomplished with extensive office operations and personnel organization expertise. highlights account management ms office eprocessing network netsuite team player sales office ally operations management business development eye for detail sound judgment computer-savvy social media and networks community outreach managing√¢ multiple priorities new customer acquisition articulate public speaker interpersonal skills calm under pressure multi-media marketing accomplishments received a merit raise for strong attention to detail, exemplary customer service and team-player attitude. successfully planned and executed corporate meetings, lunches, and special events for groups of 20+ employees. in charge of implementation of office evolution columbus's social media, marketing, and online blog presence.
